The graveknight summons a supernatural mount, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Marvelous Mount] heightened to a rank equal to half the graveknight's level. Unlike marvelous mount, the steed's AC and saving throw bonuses are all 4 lower than the graveknight's, and the steed has one-third the graveknight's Hit Points (rounded down).

If the steed is destroyed, the graveknight must wait 1 hour before using this ability again.
